detailed_explanation: Quick Actions let you do routine tasks with just one button click instead of navigating through multiple pages. Like speed dial for your work tasks!
use_cases: Approve all pending requests|Send weekly report|Mark notifications as read
advantages: Save time on repetitive tasks|Reduce mistakes|Get work done faster
how_to_use:
1. Find Quick Actions button at top
2. Click Add New Quick Action
3. Choose what it should do
4. Give it a name
5. Click Save

short_description: Save your favorite filters and searches
detailed_explanation: Save filter setups so you can use them again with one click. No more re-typing dates or re-selecting options!
use_cases: Save This Week's Schedule|Create My Team's Tasks view|Set up Urgent Items filter
advantages: No repeating filter setup|Find things in seconds|Share views with team
how_to_use:
1. Set up filters you like
2. Click Save Current View
3. Give it a name
4. Check Share with team if needed
5. Click Save

detailed_explanation: Get friendly reminders before things become urgent so you have time to fix issues instead of finding out too late.
use_cases: Get notified 2 days before deadline|Warning when tasks take too long|Alert when approvals waiting
advantages: Never miss deadlines|Time to fix problems early|Less stress
how_to_use:
1. Go to Settings â†’ Notifications
2. Turn on Priority Alerts
3. Choose advance warning time
4. Pick notification method
5. Save
